chapter.title: Hibernate Community
chapter.para:
There are a number of ways to become involved in the Hibernate community, including
Trying stuff out and reporting bugs. See for details.
Trying your hand at fixing some bugs or implementing enhancements. Again, see .
lists a number of ways to engage in the community including mailing lists, forums, IRC and others.
Helping improve or translate this documentation. Contact us on the developer mailing list if you have interest.
Evangelizing Hibernate within your organization.
